content.rendered: It was a great pleasure to meet Chilean musician, singer and songwriter Pascuala Ilabaca just before she and her band Fauna started their UK tour. I also caught their absolutely brilliant gig at Rich Mix this week – pictures to come later. Read an interview with Pascuala on Rhythm Passport.
